thread.section_title: iMore - The #1 iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch blog
thread.title: Best new apps and games for iPhone and iPad
thread.title_full: Best new apps and games for iPhone and iPad

author: Joseph Keller
title: Best new apps and games for iPhone and iPad
text:
What are the hottest new apps on the App Store right now? These!
There are over a million and a half apps for iPhone and iPad and the number just keeps growing. Every day new and newly updated apps hit the App Store , and it's impossible to keep up with all of them. Luckily, you don't have to. All you have to do is bookmark this page and come back every day. When you do, we'll have the best of the best new apps waiting for you!
Best new and updated apps This week, put an old-time spin on your photos, sell your stuff in a social marketplace, get an answer to that tough homework question, and much more.

TinType by Hipstamatic - With TinType, you can give your photos a old-time feel with three authentic tintype camera effects. With its latest update, TinType offers a brand new interface, a new pull down gesture to get back to your camera, and more - Free - Download Now YEAY - This app offers you a social marketplace that lets you sell your stuff using video. You make a video of the item you want to sell, and prospective buyers can check it out, get in touch with you and more. YEAY recently added an iMessage app to let you share your wishlist with your friends. - Free - Download Now Socratic - Got a question on your homework that you just can't find the answer for, or a particularly difficult math problem? Then fire up Socratic and use your phone's camera to get an explanation or step-by-step guide for that question. - Free - Download Now Codex - Keep your physical notebooks and documents organized digitally with Codex. You can scan in your documents, photos, and more, and organize them by tags to make them easier to find. - Free - Download Now LogoMetric - Design your own custom logo using LogoMetric's editable templates. Take advantage of the app's 120 fonts to create colorful, geometric logos that speak to who you and your company are. - $2.99 - Download Now Gifs Art by PicsArt - Take pictures or choose from your existing photos to make fun GIFs that you can share. Add effects, stickers, and much more to create something unique. - Free - Download Now Best new games This week, journey to find your stolen treasure, get your arcade action fix, take on quests to make your way in the world, and assemble a team of heroes in a galaxy far, far away.

Red's Kingdom - Play as Red, the toothy squirrel, as he travels through the kingdom solving puzzles and battling goons to retrieve his golden nut, which was stolen by the Mad King Mac! You'll explore through 17 unique areas and enjoy the cartoon-esque like graphics as you find treasure, collect nuts, unlock special powers. - $4.99 - Download Now Z-Exemplar - A retro side-scrolling shooter that's heavily inspired by classic arcade shooters like Gradius and R-Type. Blast your way through a plethora of different enemies, collect power-ups, and upgrade your vast arsenal of weaponry with over 16 hours of gameplay. This fast-paced, nostalgia-inducing game is bound to make feel like you're spending quarters at your favorite arcade. - $3.99 - Download Now Blood Knights - This MMORPG promises plenty of action as you hack and slash your way through a sea of enemies. Embark on quests, explore the world, and release your inner fiend. With a single-player campaign, multiple multiplayer modes, and deep character customization, Blood Knights is an action-packed game with lots of reasons to keep playing. - Free with IAP - Download Now Sky Dancer - You've heard of skydiving, but have you heard of skydancing? Become a sky dancer and make your way from platform to platform collecting coins, avoid obstacles and falling through the a beautiful desert planet. This endless runner is simple in it's design but perfect in it's execution, if you enjoy games like Temple Run, Sky Dancer is an easy download. - Free with IAP - Download Now Star Wars: Force Arena - Assemble a team of iconic heroes from across the Star Wars saga, including new characters from Rogue One . Your team will fight in real-time battles either with or against other players in 1v1 or 2v2 battles. Collect character cards and upgrade your team to ensure your victory. - Free - Download Now Featured apps This week, Apple has put together a collection of apps that offer healthy recipes.

Fit Men Cook - Get simple, healthy recipes that are also easy on your wallet. Fit Men Cook automatically organizes recipes placed into your shopping cart by store aisle to take some of the hassle out of grocery shopping. The app can also track what you eat, and share that data with the Health app. - $2.99 - Download Now Oh She Glows - Oh She Glows features a range of plant-based recipes. Search for recipes by keyword, filter by dietary restrictions, and cross off ingredients as you use them so you don't lose your place. - $1.99 - Download Now Caveman Feast - This app offers 250 recipes for those on the Paleo diet, each easy with beautiful photography and clear instructions. Easily plan a week's worth of meals, search recipes by ingredient, and organize your cart by store aisle to make for better grocery shopping. - $2.99 - Download Now Free app of the week Angry Birds Space - The Angry Birds and dastardly piggies head to the final frontier, shooting across low and zero-g environments, and taking advantage of their new special abilities.

Here's just some of what you can expect from Angry Birds Space:
Over 300 interstellar levels! New playable characters! Unique special abilities for each bird! Zero-gravity space adventures! Trick shots using planets' gravity! Hidden bonus levels! Beautifully detailed backgrounds! Daily Missions! You can get Angry Birds Space for free from the App Store until January 26.
Free - Download Now
